title: The Darkness Surrounds Us
description: Soft cover book titled THE DARKNESS SURROUNDS US by Gilbert Sorrentino. Poets first book. Published by Jonathan Williams in 1960. With illustrated frontispiece portrait of poet. See my photographs (4) of this publication on main listing page. Bookseller since 1995 (LL-2-middle-up) rareviewbooks
author: Gilbert Sorrentino
